<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Copper Penny](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2100)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to  explorer's clothing  (or another item in the unarmored defense category)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561))</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You are knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31)

**Requirement** You're an expert in [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1), and you are unarmored.
</row>

</column>

---

This plain copper coin is typically affixed near the feet, on a pant leg or hem. When you Activate it, you Stand and can't be knocked prone again on the current turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
